exclusive: We work on your home with exclusivity and dedication, and we perform close monitoring throughout the entire process.

list.agencies: Sharing the sale with all agencies in the market.

meta_description: Sell properties in Portugal with real estate consultant Sofia Galvão from Sofia Galvão Group.

paragraph.bottom: Our aim is to find you the best Client in the shortest amount of time, and for that purpose we offer:
paragraph.middle: We offer a consultancy service tailored to your needs, focusing on promotion strategy, publicity, and the best negotiation.
paragraph.top: We guarantee the best deal for the sale of your home.
